languages.text: "Лорд-капитан, вы собрали достаточно сведений для поимки преступника. Дождитесь меня в кают-компании, и мы поставим точку в расследовании".
"Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."
languages.original_text: "Лорд-капитан, вы собрали достаточно сведений для поимки преступника. Дождитесь меня в кают-компании, и мы поставим точку в расследовании".

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, then we can bring this investigation to a close."
"Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, then we can bring this investigation to a close."
"Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."
"Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."
"Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."
"Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."

languages.text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les preuves en votre possession suffisent largement à appréhender le coupable. Je viendrai vous faire mon rapport au mess et nous pourrons enfin clore cette enquête. »
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."

traits.locale_text: « {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, les preuves en votre possession suffisent largement à appréhender le coupable. Je viendrai vous faire mon rapport au mess et nous pourrons enfin clore cette enquête. »

languages.text: «Lord Capitán, las pruebas que ha acumulado son suficientes para apresar al culpable. Le informaré en el comedor y podremos poner fin a esta investigación».
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."

traits.locale_text: «Lord Capitán, las pruebas que ha acumulado son suficientes para apresar al culpable. Le informaré en el comedor y podremos poner fin a esta investigación».

languages.text: “舰长大人，您已经收集到了足够的证据，足以逮捕嫌犯了。我准备在食堂里向您汇报，届时这场调查也便可以告一段落了。”
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."

traits.locale_text: “舰长大人，您已经收集到了足够的证据，足以逮捕嫌犯了。我准备在食堂里向您汇报，届时这场调查也便可以告一段落了。”

languages.text: 「ロード・キャプテン。あなたが集めた証拠は犯人を逮捕するのに十分です。食堂で報告し、この捜査を終結させますよ」
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."

traits.locale_text: 「ロード・キャプテン。あなたが集めた証拠は犯人を逮捕するのに十分です。食堂で報告し、この捜査を終結させますよ」

languages.text: "Lord Captain, die von Euch gesammelten Beweise reichen aus, um den Täter zu ergreifen. Ich erstattet Euch in der Kantine Bericht, dann bringen wir diese Ermittlungen zum Abschluss."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Captain, die von Euch gesammelten Beweise reichen aus, um den Täter zu ergreifen. Ich erstattet Euch in der Kantine Bericht, dann bringen wir diese Ermittlungen zum Abschluss."

languages.text: "Topladığınız kanıtlar, suçluyu tutuklamak için yeterli Lord Kaptan. Yemekhanede size bilgilendirme yapacağım. Sonrasında da bu sorguyu sonlandıracağız."
languages.original_text: "Lord Captain, the evidence you have collected is sufficient to apprehend the culprit. I will report to you in the mess hall, and we shall bring this investigation to a close."
